hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) led us in prayer and then went up to the pulpit and beckoned with both hands towards the Qibla of the mosque and then said, "When I started leading you in prayer, I saw the display of Paradise and Hell on the wall of the mosque (facing the Qibla). I never saw good and bad as I have seen today." He repeated the last statement thrice

chapter.ara-name: باب رَفْعِ الْبَصَرِ إِلَى الإِمَامِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To cast a look at the Imam during As-Salat (the prayer)
